emails.kotak.in.subject: Search smart – avoid online information traps 🤕
emails.kotak.in.content:
Click to know more 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
To view this message in HTML format, click here:
 https://t1.emails.kotak.in/r/?id=t07a49a1d-0188-4f1c-8cea-17a97d434a82,14c74a4,aed58&e=cDE9JTQwcHNQJTJGT3JONkNNUnNWMFJEc1N3RW54dFNXZVdXbW1kV3Y3c1RJclk0cjhLVkw4d1drdUFpS2ZJWDNwOGNxUE1hUG9xSlN4NiUyRmI4MiUyQmxCWlIlMkJxekJXdyUzRCUzRA&s=RNQqRDjTuk-RAxLVq6gAiP9cFJZl-te9fT6-PHksQcU 
or paste this link in a Web browser
----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
	

	
	

 https://t1.emails.kotak.in/r/?id=t07a49a1d-0188-4f1c-8cea-17a97d434a82,14c74a4,aed59 	
	
	

Dear Jyotirmay Sethi, 	
With the advent of the digital era, cyber frauds are on the rise with fraudsters finding ways to lure you into getting away with your hard-earned money. Protect yourself from falling prey to any of these frauds: 	
	

	
	
Search Engine 
Fraud 	
Sometimes, when you are looking for information, you may search online for details. You may come across fake results via ads, links leading to fake websites, and contact numbers. 	
	
	
	

You may end up calling the fake number of ‘click on’ links on the fake sites. The fraudster will then lure you with details, offers, easy and fast resolutions, offer refunds, convenience at your doorstep, etc. They will then find ways into getting you to share your Banking/personal details. 	
	
Always visit the official website when looking for help and look for the padlock sign or 'https' in the status bar of genuine official websites. 	
	

Narcotics/ 
Customs Fraud 	
Fraudsters posing as Narcotics Team/Cyber Cell/Customs will contact you and claim that they are in receipt of a courier containing illegal items in your name! 	
	
Claiming the case to be in police custody, they will scare you by asking you to join a video call where they impersonate a police station set up and claim that you are under digital arrest. 	
	
	
	
	
	

Then to evade legal

emails.kotak.in.subject: Protect yourself from ATM fraud!
emails.kotak.in.content:
Stay alert of fraudsters offering help at ATMs 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
To view this message in HTML format, click here:
 https://t1.emails.kotak.in/r/?id=t55cb5673-f422-494a-9f56-9cd30e9e47e2,10c8b29,8bb32&e=cDE9JTQwd3k2eSUyQnRyMk10JTJCSkUwYmhoUlY0eFFnajlyNExCZ21NcWVVRFdWd1c0cEVKM0ZFd3l2UUw3NzZQYUIlMkZ3VmZPRXAlMkJZUWtXWCUyQlFuNlBSJTJCN3JwS2JxWkElM0QlM0Q&s=jIJMEh8moAUmAHRw4I3ghyqwX3I079MEcQ-1cqMaeLE 
or paste this link in a Web browser
----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
	

 https://t1.emails.kotak.in/r/?id=t55cb5673-f422-494a-9f56-9cd30e9e47e2,10c8b29,8bb33 	
	
	

Dear Jyotirmay, 	
Be careful when using ATMs as there are recent scams where your card could be retained, and your PIN can be stolen by fraudsters. Stay alert and avoid sharing confidential information. 	
	
	

Top ATM security tips: 	
	

	
Check the ATM for any signs of damage or strange parts before using it 	
	
	
  	
	

	
Look quickly for any odd devices before inserting your card 	
	
	
  	
	

	
Turn on SMS alerts to know about every transaction 	
	
	
	

	
Keep your PIN secret when using the ATM 	
	
	
  	
	

	
If your card is lost or stolen, inform your bank right away 	
	
	
  	
	

	
Don't accept help from strangers 	
	
	
	
	
	

	Change your PIN regularly and at random times 	
	
	
	
	
	

	

• 	Do not share any sensitive information with anyone such as your Debit/Credit Card details, MPIN, UPI PIN, Net Banking password, or any other PIN/OTP that the bank sends you. 	
• 	Kotak Mahindra Bank or its employees/representatives will never ask for your personal account information. Please do not respond to fraudulent emails or SMS that ask you for such details. 	
• 	Always visit the bank’s official website –  www.kotak.com www.kotak.com  or call on 1860 266 2666 (local call charges apply) for any banking queries. 	
• 	Always visit the bank’s o

cred.club.subject: your IndusInd Bank reward point redemptions are changing
cred.club.content: a new update on your                                                                                                                     INDUSIND BANK CREDIT CARD                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          starting September 1st 2025 , a redemption                           fee will be applied on the redemption of IndusInd                           Bank reward points.                           here's a closer look at how this update could                           affect your everyday transactions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          the fine print, explained.                                                                                                                     IndusInd Bank will charge a redemption fee of                           5% + GST when you use your reward points via                           the Pay With Rewards program (TWID).                                                      so, if your cart value is ₹1,000 and you pay                           ₹400 using your 600 reward points (1.5RP = ₹1),                           you'll be charged a redemption fee of ₹23.6                           (5% of ₹400 + 18% GST)                           there is no fee for Pioneer Private, Pioneer                           Heritage, EazyDiner Signature, EazyDiner                           Platinum and Avios Vis

cred.club.subject: your HDFC Bank credit card perks are changing.
cred.club.content: new  updates on your                                                        HDFC Bank Credit Card                                                                                                                                                                                                  HDFC Bank has updated important terms                     and conditions of your credit card, effective                     July 1st, 2025.                                                        here's a closer look at the latest updates and how they could affect your everyday transactions.                                                                                                                                                                                                  the fine print, explained.                                                                                                                                          1. charges on online gaming spends                                                                                                          current                        no charge                                                                    updated                        1% charge on online skill-based gaming spends above ₹10,000/month                                                                                                                                                        if you spend more than ₹10,000 on platforms like Dream11, MPL etc. in a month, you’ll be charged a 1% fee on the total amount spent. the charge is capped at ₹4,999 per month. these spends won’t be eligible for reward points.

cibilscore.transunion.com.subject: Alert from TransUnion CIBIL - Your CIBIL Report has changed. Here's why.
cibilscore.transunion.com.content:
Hi Jyotirmay, You have received this email because there has been a change in your CIBIL Report.Login to your myCIBIL account and upgrade to check the details. Your CIBIL Score and Report plays a vital part in the loan approval process.  A high CIBIL Score enables faster and cheaper access to credit.  Monitoring your CIBIL Score and report regularly helps you stay updated on changes that may impact your access to credit. Click here to learn more. Our new Alerts feature helps you monitor your CIBIL Score and Report effortlessly and provides you with a real-time  notification in case any of the below-mentioned changes: New Enquiry Added New Loan Account Opened New Address Added New Phone Number Added Change in Utilization Change in Delinquency Change in CIBIL Score Stay connected. Stay Alert.Log in to upgrade now . Thanks and Regards, The Consumer Services Team (Electronically generated. Does not require a signature.) This document is classified as: (X) Confidential The information contained in this electronic message (including any attachments) is intended for exclusive use of the addressee(s) and may contain some proprietary and/or confidential or privileged information. If by oversight you are not the intended recipient, we request you not to disclose, disseminate, distribute or copy this e-mail to anyone else. Also, please notify the sender immediately and destroy all copies of this message and any attachment(s). Thank You. TransUnion CIBIL Limited CIN: U72300MH2000PLC128359
  Registered Office: One World Center, Tower 2, 19th Floor, Senapati Bapat Marg, Elphinstone Road, Mumbai - 400013 Tel: 91-22-6140 4300 on Mon to Sat (10:00 AM to 06:00 PM).   Click here to unsubscribe

icicibank.com.subject: Amazon Pay ICICI Bank Credit Card Statement for the period July 13, 2025 to August 12, 2025
icicibank.com.content: emailer_ss1 Here is your eStatement for August 2025 Dear JYOTIRMAY SETHI Thank you for choosing eStatements. Please find attached your ICICI Bank Credit Card eStatement for August 2025. Your eStatement is in Adobe Acrobat Portable Document Format (PDF). You need Adobe Acrobat Reader to view the attached file. If you do not have Adobe Acrobat Reader, please click here to download for free. Your SMART STATEMENT is now just a CLICK AWAY !! Enjoy a seamless experience with ONE VIEW STATEMENT and revolutionize the way you manage and interact with your credit card statement. Click here to access your Smart Statement How to view your PDF statement The first four letters of your password are the first four letters of your name as displayed on your Credit Card, followed by your date and month of birth (in DDMM format). The password is case sensitive (lowercase). Please do not include any special characters or spaces. icicibank.com.content:
Dear Customer,

We have process the limit enhancement request for your credit card account with the new Service Reference Number SR1062067192 within 8 working days . Once the request is processed, you will receive an email and mobile alert with the status of your request to your registered E-mail ID and mobile number.  Please note that the limit increase is subject to the bank's credit policies.

Sincerely,

Saily Pol
Customer Service Associate
Team ICICI Bank

Take control of your financial future- open an ICICI Direct Demat and Trading account with zero account opening charges. Get started now- https://icici.co/ICICIT/k/DUvfES3KYrw

NEVER SHARE your OTP, CVV, URN, User ID, password etc. with anyone, even if the caller claims to be from ICICI Bank, Bank employees will never ask you for these details. Please safeguard these account details as sharing it can lead to unauthorized access to your account.



On 30-07-2025 21:12:57 JOTIRMAY wrote: 
External Email Warning: Do not click on any attachment or links/URL in this email unless sender is reliable.


Hi Team,

I m finding the credit card quite useful and have decided to make it my primary card. However, my monthly spending may exceed the current limit of ?1L. Even last month, I reached around 40 50% of the limit despite using it only partially. Going forward, my avg monthly spend is around ?80K.

Hence, I d like to request an increase in the credit limit to ?4L.

I had also raised this request earlier with your customer support (Reference: SR1061158353).

Please find attached my last 3 months payslips for reference.

Note: You may notice entries for Salary Advance and Anytime Pay in the payslips. These are not actual advances but a feature Amazon provides, allowing employees to access up to 90% of their salary anytime during the month.

Thank you for your support.

--

with regards
Jyotirmay sethi

custcomm.icicibank.com.subject: Beware of fraudsters impersonating bank representatives
custcomm.icicibank.com.content:
Dear Customer,

Fraudsters impersonating bank representatives can trick you into
sharing sensitive information on the pretext of deactivating card
protection plans, waiving off charges levied or offers on increase in
credit
limit. 

Common tactics used by fraudsters:

•Speaking professionally to appear genuine and gain your trust

•Asking you to share credentials like full Card number, CVV, OTP,
Date of Birth, etc.

•May ask you to open some links or download any APK files.

How to protect yourself?

Never share confidential details: Bank never asks for your full
Card number, CVV, OTP to download apps through links

Avoid unknown links or
apps: Do not click on suspicious links or instal APK files shared
through SMS, e-mail or social media

Verify with official sources: Always use Bank’s official website or
app for any request or service updates

Stay
vigilant: Report any suspicious activity immediately through official
ICICI Bank modes.

Report Fraud

If you are a victim of
online fraud, reach out to the National Cyber Crime at
cybercrime.gov.in
<http://lnk.custcomm.icicibank.com/vtrack?clientid=54938&ul=
VAMFXQEKAQ1LB0lSXxFbEQtWHRUIAAVwU15YDFtIAV1ZHRhJAA==&ml=VAMEUAEHRARLAQMPA1MFHw==&sl=IU5zGWZhRGd6YklUXg4cABNEEAVWX1seXVBQBl4EA1xfTwdaXBgA&pp=0&c=0000&fl=C0ZEFUAIFxtAQUIWURZBBhJESg9aW1VZVlJXDhkFDV8bAgVYQQVZBFZAHVRYXlQEFxYVR1VKDFVGXFBBC19VTVECAlAcWE1aUhkECx8WRgIfGgUKXEBCH1lSSRVSAk0DGgkQWF0=&ext=>
 , call the helpline on 1930 or call ICICI Bank helpline on 18002662. 

Always
remember:

1.Do NOT click on any links in the e-mail received from an unknown
person

2.Do NOT share any confidential / sensitive information with anyone.

If you have received any malicious/phishing/suspicious e-mails or
calls, please report it to Sanchar Saathi at sancharsaathi.gov.in
<http://lnk.custcomm.icicibank.com/vtrack?clientid=54938&ul=
VAMFXQEKAQ1LB0lSXxFbEQtWHRUIAAVwU15YDFtIAV1ZHRhJAA==&ml=VAMEUAEHRARLAQMPA1MFHw==&sl=IU5zGWZhRGd6YklUX

canarabank.com.subject: ATM/IMPS/UPI Transaction Alert
canarabank.com.content:
Dear Customer,

Thanking you for banking with Canara Bank.

An amount of INR 25.00 has been DEBITED to your account XXXX5159 on 24/08/2025. Total Avail.bal INR 79,770.73.To report fraud & stop further debit SMS SUSPECT to 56161.

If not done by you, send an email from your registered e-mail id with the subject line as per below format to reportfraud@canarabank.com to block the respective channels or account.

To block Internet banking: LOCKIBU<Space><Internet Banking Userid>
To block Mobile Banking:   BLOCKMB<Space><Mobile Number prefixed with Country Code>
To block UPI: BLOCKUPI<Space><Mobile Number prefixed with Country Code>
To block Accounts: BLOCKACC<Space><<Mobile Number prefixed with Country Code>

*Once you choose BLOCKACC,  you may have to visit the home branch to unblock the accounts. Other options will block only the particular channel.

For blocking through SMS, send SMS from Registered Mobile Number as per below formats:
To block the Account : SUSPECT to 56161
To block UPI: BLOCKUPI to 9901771222
To block Mobile Banking : BLOCKMB  to 9901771222
To block Internet Banking : LOCKIBU <USERID> to 9010982223

This is an auto generated mail

With Regards,
Canara Bank
Toll Free No:1800 1030
